section.p: Disposition information provides an accounting for all subjects who entered the study and may include protocol milestones, such as randomization, as well as the subject's completion status or reason for discontinuation for the entire study or each phase or segment of the study, including screening and post-treatment follow-up.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code drawn from a controlled terminology for the event or protocol milestone. The verbatim name for the term must be captured as well. [SDTM:DSTERM; DSDECOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
The start date/time of the disposition event. [SDTM: DSSTDTC]

SHALL contain [1..2] id
An identifier that is used to ensure the uniqueness of subject records within the substance use domain. [SDTM: DSSEQ, DSREFID] Note, the Sequence Number is required.
Contains zero or one [0..1] dispositionCategoryAssociation with data type disposition Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] dispositionSubCategoryAssociation with data type disposition Sub Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Epoch with data type Study Epoch
Contains zero or one [0..1] data Collection with data type Data Collection
Contains zero or one [0..1] group Identifier with data type Group Identifier
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Day Period with data type Study Day Period
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..2] id
An identifier that is used to ensure the uniqueness of subject records within the substance use domain. [SDTM: DSSEQ, DSREFID] Note, the Sequence Number is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code drawn from a controlled terminology for the event or protocol milestone. The verbatim name for the term must be captured as well. [SDTM:DSTERM; DSDECOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
The start date/time of the disposition event. [SDTM: DSSTDTC]
Contains zero or one [0..1] dispositionCategoryAssociation with data type disposition Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] dispositionSubCategoryAssociation with data type disposition Sub Category Association
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Epoch with data type Study Epoch
Contains zero or one [0..1] data Collection with data type Data Collection
Contains zero or one [0..1] group Identifier with data type Group Identifier
Contains zero or one [0..1] study Day Period with data type Study Day Period
